content: I wrote a RFC. Should I post it to "lean4"? Or just leave it on GH and see if someone from the Lean 4 team looks at it?

usual practice is to just post it to GH, although I think some part of the issue template says to make sure there is some support on zulip and link to a conversation so usually there will be both GH and zulip components of an RFC
Tom has marked this topic as resolved.
